title: (x) Modern, Clean, Script Font - probably custom by Anchalee Chambundabongse, similar to Coquette {Riccardo}
content:
Hey all you font fundi's out there! I'm looking for a font that looks like the Katy Schmaty logo or is close to it..any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [katyschmatyjewelry.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011061950/http:/typophile.com/files/katyschmatyjewelry.jpg) | 31.73 KB |
author: caperobin

comments.content:
I suppose it's custom:  
 [http://anchalee-ny.com/index.php?/projects/katy-schmaty/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011061950/http:/anchalee-ny.com/index.php?/projects/katy-schmaty/ "http://anchalee-ny.com/index.php?/projects/katy-schmaty/")

But maybe something like Coquette Light could give the same feeling:  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/coquette/light/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011061950/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/coquette/light/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/coquette/light/")
See also the suggestions in this thread: [Modern script cursive font](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011061950/http:/typophile.com/node/58038).
It looks like something that could have been done by [Jessica Hische](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011061950/http:/jessicahische.com/)
